message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $8,000. Considering its exceptional quality and benefits, I would like to extend an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $7,200. This is an excellent chance to save $800 while securing a high-quality item that aligns perfectly with your requirements. Please let me know if you're interested in taking advantage of this offer.
